##Cost to AMPATH
```{r}
patients <- c(1:200)

# Clinic
mpa_cl <- 15
hcw_hr_cl <- 25
apps_cl <- 5
fc_cl <- 400
vc_cl <- 5

#Co-Op
mpa_cp <- 20
hcw_hr_cp <- 20
apps_cp <- 5
fc_cp <- 200
vc_cp <- 10


cta_cl <- (((((mpa_cl/60)*hcw_hr_cl)*apps_cl)+vc_cl)*patients)+fc_cl
cta_cp <- (((((mpa_cp/60)*hcw_hr_cp)*apps_cp)+vc_cp)*patients)+fc_cp

plot(cta_cl,type = "l",col = "red", xlab = "Patients Treated", ylab = "Annual Cost", 
   main = "AMPATH Costs Per Patient by Treatment Model")
lines(cta_cp, type = "l", col = "blue")
```

## Cost to Patient
```{r}
apps <- c(1:6)
mtcl <- 95
mtcp <- 80
wtcl <- 20
wtcp <- 25
atcl <- 15
atcp <- 15
oc <- 5

ctp_cl <- (apps*(mtcl+wtcl+atcl)) 
ctp_cp <- (apps*(mtcp+wtcp+atcp))

plot(ctp_cl,type = "o",col = "red", xlab = "Appointments per year", ylab = "Annual Cost", 
   main = "Patient Costs Per Appointment by Treatment Model")
lines(ctp_cp, type = "o", col = "blue")
```
